page.title: 18BROOKLANDS RESTAURANT&MOTEL
page.content: Brooklands restaurant and motel in Dodworth near the M1 motorway at Dodworth.Covers an area of 6.7 acres with intended extensions of 3.5 acres.Employs 56 people including 5 chefs,2 head waiters,11 waitresses and 2 chalet maids.9% of employees are from Dodworth.The restaurant seats 110 customers and 68 in the bar.There are 20 double rooms with telephone,colour T.V.,mini bar,tea making facilities and full bathroom suite.4 rooms cater for handicapped.Only Â£27.50 a room per night including breakfast.
